questions.title: 没有什么比在大热天的晚上吃冰镇的西瓜更让我惬意了。
questions.answer: I like nothing better than a frappe watermelon on a hot evening.

questions.title: 我最想当一名户外探险者。
questions.answer: I like nothing better than to be a outdoor adventurers.

questions.title: 我最喜欢在晚饭后喝乌梅汁。
questions.answer: I like nothing better than drinking ume juice after supper.

questions.title: 在炎热的夏天，我最喜欢在海边散步。
questions.answer: In hot summer, I like nothing better than to have a walk at seaside.

title: ——你为什么喜欢乡村？
——我最想有一天成为农民。
——你只是一个女人，你可以过舒适的生活。

answer.en: Why do you like the country?
I like nothing better than to be farmer some days.
You are just a woman, you can live a comfortable life.

title: ——你的人生目标是什么，是当一名记者还是作家？
——我喜欢当野外摄影师胜过一切。

answer.en: What's your life goal, reporter or writer?
I like nothing better than to be a field photographer.

title: ——说实话，我的哥哥最喜欢玩游戏。
——如果这么说，我会认为你哥哥不是一个上进的人。

answer.en: To tell the truth, my brother likes nothing better than playing games.
If you say so, I'll regard him not an aspirant man.
